tiles.name: neo_mumbai_sky_city_perimeter
tiles.description: The heavily guarded outer ring of the sky-city, a stark visual barrier separating the elite from the underlevels below.

tiles.name: conglomerate_hydroponics_farm_a
tiles.description: Automated hydroponics farms controlled by the Conglomerates, providing the sky-city with its nutrient-rich food supply, but leaving little for the underlevels.

tiles.name: gamma_7_waste_recycling_center
tiles.description: One of the central waste processing plants in Gamma-7, struggling to keep up with the immense amounts of refuse generated.

tiles.name: sector_epsilon_black_market
tiles.description: A bustling hub for illicit trade and salvaged technology, where Vansh might find rare components for his projects.

tiles.name: dilapidated_verti_farm_ruins
tiles.description: The skeletal remains of pre-Collapse vertical farms, now abandoned and overgrown, a reminder of a more sustainable past.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_industrial_zone_alpha
tiles.description: A sprawling industrial complex producing essential goods for the sky-city, releasing toxic fumes that constantly pollute the underlevels.

tiles.name: underlevel_nutrient_paste_factory
tiles.description: A grim facility churning out the unappetizing but vital nutrient paste that sustains the majority of Gamma-7's population.

tiles.name: gamma_7_artificial_sunlight_array
tiles.description: A massive array of lamps struggling to provide artificial sunlight, flickering intermittently and casting long, eerie shadows.

tiles.name: sector_beta_reclamation_zone
tiles.description: A zone where scavenging gangs reclaim materials from old buildings.

tiles.name: abandoned_maglev_transit_station
tiles.description: A derelict maglev station, a relic of a more advanced transportation system, now a haven for squatters and black marketeers.

tiles.name: sky_city_cable_maintenance_access
tiles.description: A heavily guarded point where cables from the sky-city reach down to connect to the facilities below.

tiles.name: conglomerate_research_facility_perimeter
tiles.description: The heavily-patrolled perimeter of a Conglomerate research facility, rumored to hold advanced technologies and dark secrets.

tiles.name: sector_gamma_7_main_plaza
tiles.description: The largest open space in Gamma-7, often used for impromptu gatherings, black market stalls, and Conglomerate propaganda broadcasts.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_old_town_district
tiles.description: Remnants of pre-collapse architecture, heavily modified. Some historical sites remain buried beneath layers of metal and grime.

tiles.name: ruined_reservoir_district
tiles.description: The dried-out reservoir, now filled with shacks and makeshift buildings. Source of several health concerns due to contaminated water.

tiles.name: industrial_smelter_complex
tiles.description: Ore is processed into new building materials. Air quality is extremely poor, filled with acrid fumes.

tiles.name: underlevel_resistance_hideout
tiles.description: A clandestine base of operations for a local resistance cell, plotting against the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: collapsed_highway_overpass
tiles.description: The remains of a highway that fell into disrepair after the Great Collapse, serving as a barrier between different underlevel sectors.

tiles.name: dilapidated_power_station
tiles.description: An aging power station providing a limited and unreliable supply of electricity to Gamma-7. Prone to frequent blackouts.

tiles.name: abandoned_pre_collapse_library
tiles.description: A treasure trove of knowledge from the past, buried beneath layers of debris, waiting to be rediscovered by someone like Vansh.

tiles.name: sky_city_water_purification_outlet
tiles.description: The outlet pumps water filtered from sky-city to the surface reservoirs.

tiles.name: conglomerate_security_outpost
tiles.description: Heavily guarded security forces patrol the region. They are the eyes and ears of the Conglomerates, rooting out dissent and enforcing control.

tiles.name: sector_gamma_7_canal_district
tiles.description: A district bisected by murky canals carrying industrial waste. A common meeting point for shady deals and secret exchanges.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_memorial_garden
tiles.description: Few plants remain in a token gesture of respect to the natural world that was lost.

tiles.name: radioactive_dumpsite
tiles.description: The burial ground of dangerous waste from sky-city. This causes an inhospitable environment.

tiles.name: reclaimed_tech_junkyard
tiles.description: Scrap collectors reclaim rare tech components and resell them at high prices.

tiles.name: gamma_7_ventilation_shaft_zone
tiles.description: The opening of the air conditioning system that filters sky-city's clean air, and sends smoggy air to Gamma-7.

tiles.name: collapsed_skyscrapers
tiles.description: The remains of skyscrapers are incorporated into the shanty homes.

tiles.name: broken_train_tracks
tiles.description: The broken train tracks that never delivered.

tiles.name: pre_collapse_aquarium_site
tiles.description: The place where the old aquarium used to be, now buried under rubble.

tiles.name: sky_city_construction_zone
tiles.description: The perimeter to sky-city is continually being built with supplies drawn from under-levels.

tiles.name: automated_drone_patrol_route
tiles.description: The sky zone with automated drone patrols.

tiles.name: sector_gamma_7_maintenance_tunnel
tiles.description: A vast network that snakes through gamma-7's underbelly.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_grand_bazaar
tiles.description: The Bazaar is a commercial hub. Most residents of Gamma-7 come here to trade.

tiles.name: sector_epsilon_sewage_processing
tiles.description: The location where the waste goes.

tiles.name: contaminated_slum_district
tiles.description: One of the poorest slums in gamma-7. Health conditions are terrible.

tiles.name: underlevel_scavenger_camp
tiles.description: Scavengers that travel to the dumpsite to collect scraps.

tiles.name: collapsed_subway_tunnel
tiles.description: Dark dangerous tunnels for a different time.

tiles.name: dilapidated_solar_panel_farm
tiles.description: The old solar farm that is no longer maintained.

tiles.name: abandoned_botanical_gardens
tiles.description: One of the natural gardens, no longer accessible. Only a few know how to enter.

tiles.name: overcrowded_housing_block
tiles.description: Overcrowded housing is common in gamma-7. Residents live in close quarters.

tiles.name: rebellious_art_installation
tiles.description: Art with underlying anti-sky city messages.

tiles.name: sector_gamma_7_old_city_walls
tiles.description: The ancient, mossy remains of an old civilization.

tiles.name: remains_of_ancient_religious_site
tiles.description: The place where the old temple was, now buried in debris.

tiles.name: gamma_7_illegal_trading_post
tiles.description: Illegally traded goods.

tiles.name: smoggy_horizon_overview
tiles.description: The world of smog and ruin

tiles.name: illegal_robot_fights
tiles.description: Bots are used in illegal pit fights

tiles.name: collapsing_water_towers
tiles.description: The towers are crumbling under neglect. Residents must use the broken shells to gather water.

tiles.name: the_conglomerate_prison
tiles.description: Heavily armed and filled with those who fight against the establishment.

tiles.name: the_edge_of_neo_mumbai
tiles.description: The barrier between the sky-city and gamma-7.

tiles.name: gamma_7_resistance_headquarters
tiles.description: A safe area for the rebellion.

tiles.name: abandoned_underground_market
tiles.description: The market that used to be is now abandoned.

tiles.name: sky_city_express_rail
tiles.description: The express rail to sky-city.

tiles.name: gamma_7_food_distribution_center
tiles.description: The area where the food is distributed.

tiles.name: mutated_creatures_lair
tiles.description: The home of grotesque monsters.

tiles.name: collapsed_hospital
tiles.description: The hospital now only has some parts left.

tiles.name: the_hidden_vault
tiles.description: A trove of artifacts.

tiles.name: gamma_7_ancient_sewer_system
tiles.description: Ancient remains underground.

tiles.name: sky_city_industrial_drone_factory
tiles.description: The industrial drone area of sky-city.

tiles.name: overpopulated_tenement_district
tiles.description: Living conditions are poor and crowded.

tiles.name: the_great_divide
tiles.description: The edge between the two types of class.

tiles.name: forgotten_pre_collapse_research_lab
tiles.description: A place to make new scientific discoveries, but neglected by time.

tiles.name: mutated_wildlife_zone
tiles.description: Animal life is dangerous and unkempt.

tiles.name: gamma_7_underground_market
tiles.description: The hub of the underground market.

tiles.name: secret_cyberpunk_bar
tiles.description: Drinks flow in this establishment.

tiles.name: sky_city_skyscrapers
tiles.description: The tall standing buildings of the modern elite.

tiles.name: gamma_7_abandoned_workshop
tiles.description: A place with unused tools and dusty machinery.

tiles.name: the_shadowy_alleyways
tiles.description: Unknown dark things happen in these corners.

tiles.name: the_lost_generation_memorial
tiles.description: Dedicated to those lost in time.

tiles.name: sky_city_communications_array
tiles.description: Satellite communications and surveillance.

tiles.name: sky_city_drone_traffic_lanes
tiles.description: The area where all sky-city drones travel.

tiles.name: elite_sky_city_residential_sector
tiles.description: Extravagant and futuristic estates.

tiles.name: upper_gamma_7_housing_blocks
tiles.description: Less dilapidated apartments.

tiles.name: mutant_infested_swamp
tiles.description: Dangerous mutated creatures.

tiles.name: sky_city_luxury_gardens
tiles.description: Breathtaking scenery and plants.

tiles.name: upper_crust_restaurants
tiles.description: Where the upper crust eat.

tiles.name: the_underground_casino
tiles.description: For gamblers only.

tiles.name: corrupted_data_bank
tiles.description: Remnants of code gone astray.

tiles.name: elite_private_academy
tiles.description: Reserved for those who can afford.

tiles.name: radioactive_testing_zone
tiles.description: A dangerous experiment.

tiles.name: hidden_resistance_training_ground
tiles.description: An old dojo is now a training center.

tiles.name: black_market_weapon_supplier
tiles.description: The place where people are armed.

tiles.name: abandoned_factory_complex
tiles.description: The place that once was is in shambles.

tiles.name: sky_city_entertainment_district
tiles.description: A time to let loose in a technological world.

tiles.name: the_gated_community
tiles.description: A place separated from the rest.

tiles.name: the_forgotten_laboratory
tiles.description: Lost tech lies inside.

tiles.name: gamma_7_sewage_runoff
tiles.description: Run-off from the city above.

tiles.name: sky_city_council_building
tiles.description: Where the elite decide the fate.

tiles.name: robotics_graveyard
tiles.description: Robots used and abused.

tiles.name: black_market_augmentation_clinic
tiles.description: Tech meets biology in this market.

tiles.name: broken_highway_of_dreams
tiles.description: Once it was, now it is rubble.

tiles.name: the_tower_of_illusions
tiles.description: A test of reality and mind.

tiles.name: gamma_7_community_center
tiles.description: A place of gathering for the community.

tiles.name: the_conglomerate_propaganda_center
tiles.description: Spreading misinformation.

tiles.name: abandoned_pre_collapse_museum
tiles.description: What once was forgotten to time.

tiles.name: sky_city_energy_grid_center
tiles.description: Power central to the sky-city.

tiles.name: gamma_7_makeshift_hospital
tiles.description: Patching those up.

tiles.name: sky_city_security_barracks
tiles.description: Where peace is kept.

tiles.name: mutated_wildlife_migration_path
tiles.description: Animals moving from place to place.

tiles.name: the_great_artificial_skyline
tiles.description: What will come from it?
